issues.title: Volatility threshold not specified
issues.description: Requires 'volatility below the threshold' but threshold value is not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Annualized volatility (60-day rolling standard deviation of daily returns) is below 15%'

issues.title: Maximum beta not specified
issues.description: Requires 'beta less than the maximum allowed' but maximum is not defined
issues.original_text: Beta is less than the maximum allowed
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Beta relative to S&P 500 is less than 0.8 (calculated using 12-month daily returns)'

issues.title: Liquidity minimum requirement not specified
issues.description: Requires 'liquidity exceeds the minimum requirement' but minimum is not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Average daily trading volume exceeds $5 million over the past 90 calendar days'

issues.title: Market cap cutoff not specified
issues.description: Requires 'market cap above the cutoff' but cutoff value is not defined
issues.original_text: Market cap is above the cutoff

issues.title: Maximum position size cap not specified
issues.description: States 'maximum position size is capped' but doesn't specify the cap
issues.original_text: Maximum position size is capped to prevent concentration
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Maximum position size is capped at 5% of portfolio value'

issues.title: Minimum position size not specified
issues.description: States 'minimum position size is enforced' but doesn't specify the minimum
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Minimum position size is 0.5% of portfolio value'

issues.title: Drift tolerance threshold not specified
issues.description: Rebalancing triggered when 'drift exceeds tolerance threshold' but threshold not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'drift exceeds 2 percentage points from target weight'

issues.title: Regular rebalancing interval not specified
issues.description: States 'regular intervals' but doesn't specify the interval
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'quarterly intervals (last trading day of March, June, September, December)'

issues.title: Benchmark not specified
issues.description: Mentions 'outperforms the benchmark' but doesn't identify which benchmark
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'outperforms the S&P 500 Total Return Index'

issues.title: Volatility calculation methodology not specified
issues.description: References volatility but doesn't specify calculation method, lookback period, or frequency
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Annualized volatility calculated as standard deviation of daily returns over rolling 60-day window, using close-to-close returns'

issues.title: Transaction cost calculation not specified
issues.description: Mentions 'transaction costs are considered' but doesn't specify how they're calculated
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Transaction costs estimated as 0.1% of trade value (including commissions, market impact, and spread)'

issues.title: Cost-benefit calculation not specified
issues.description: States 'expected benefit exceeds the cost' but doesn't define how benefit is calculated
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Expected tracking error reduction must exceed transaction costs by at least 0.05%'

definitions.definition: weighted based on its inverse volatility. Maximum position size
rebalanced when drift exceeds the tolerance threshold or at
